title: Finding Flow

en: You come across an audio streaming service that claims to enhance one's ability to focus. The subscription is $200. However you find a coupon for 50% off. You wonder if it's worth the money.

no_caption: Nah, it might just distract me.

en: It actually helps your ability to focus a lot, and you are unusually productive as a result.
Much later you read online about someone who said they found it really useful. The coupon since expired, though. Oh well.
